department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Environment and Climate Change Canada is seeking a Mini-Compact Excavator.  Deliveries must be made on or before March 1, 2024.
description: Environment and Climate Change Canada is seeking offers from Offerors to purchase a Mini-Compact Excavator.  All the deliverables must be received on or before March 01, 2024.
duration_in_months: She is supposed to close on December 20th
full_summary:
=====================================

**Project Title**
-----------------

Mini-Compact Excavator Purchase Opportunity

**Reference Number (Contract Identifier)**
----------------------------------------

WS4279808813-Doc4331047074

**Participation Method**
-----------------------

This procurement is a Competitively bid opportunity, open to all eligible suppliers.

**Goods and Services Requirements**
--------------------------------

Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) is soliciting offers for the purchase of one Mini-Compact Excavator.  The desired completion date for this project is March 01, 2024.

**Business Requirements**
------------------------

Ammended details are attached in the associated documentation.

**Purchase Requirements**
-------------------------

Supplier shall deliver the Mini-Compact Excavator to the designated Delivery Location in British Columbia on or before the stipulated delivery date for this project. A pre-purchase technical review must be conducted prior to the final purchase agreement.

**Contractor Details**
---------------------

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5
* Contact Person: Yu, Daphne (SPAC/PSPC)
* Contact Information: daphne.yu@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Additional Details**
----------------------

* Invitation Framework: N/A
* Terms of Reference: Available upon request

**Notice URL**
---------------

To access the full text of the Invitation to Tender, kindly refer to https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18146300?extsite=MTgxNDYzMDBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==.

**Delivery Location**
---------------------

British Columbia.

**Closing Date for Applications**
--------------------------------

12:00 pm Eastern Time, 2023-12-20.
